Class AppCanvas

Namespace
BOOSEapp
Assembly
BOOSEapp.dll

Implements the BOOSE.ICanvas interface to provide drawing, positioning, shape rendering, and pen management functionalities for the BOOSE application.

public class AppCanvas : ICanvas

Gets or sets the current pen thickness. Throws CanvasException if set to zero or negative.

Draws a circle centered on the current cursor position.

public void Circle(int radius, bool filled)

Parameters

Radius of the circle.

filled bool

Whether the circle should be filled.

Exceptions

Draws a line from the current cursor position to the specified coordinates. Updates cursor position after drawing.

public void DrawTo(int x, int y)

Parameters

Target X-coordinate.

y int

Target Y-coordinate.

Exceptions

CanvasException

Thrown if the point is out of bounds.

Parameters

New X-coordinate.

New Y-coordinate.

Exceptions

Parameters

Rectangle width.

Rectangle height.

filled bool

Whether the rectangle should be filled.

Exceptions

CanvasException

Thrown if dimensions are negative.

Reset()

Resets the canvas to default settings, clears the drawing, resets cursor, pen settings, and fill mode.

public void Reset()

Draws a triangle starting from the current cursor position.

public void Tri(int width, int height)

Parameters

width int

Width of the triangle base.

Height of the triangle.
